Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I'm a player since .25 and just wanting to say hi.

A few random facts about me:

- Favorite Game Mode: Science
- Mods: KER, MechJeb(Transfers Only!), USI Life support
- OS: Windows 8
- Favorite way to eat a potato: baked ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Hi lukethecoder64. Welcome to the forum. (French fries are better, though. No offense.)

Sense .25 too. 

Love career

I used Kerble atachment System, Alarm Clock, and FAR but since 1.0 I've bin stock

Creamy mashed potatos!

Is it just me or is my font way too big?

Thanks Everyone for the warm welcome!

But baked potatoes are still better IMO.

Luke

Definitely baked. Although I consider frenched fries to be a different kind of awesome themselves.

Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw
